amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 74 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Asian Development Bank by $8 million and the Asian Development Fund by $25 million; and to restore funding by an equal amount for the African Development Bank and the African Development Fund.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Waters amendment (A013). Mr. Callahan stated that the amendment would appropriate funds without authorization and was, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
